table_caption: Convergent gray matter decreases associated with chronic smoking: cluster coordinates
table_foot: Numbering corresponds to brain regions shown in Fig. 1. Coordinates (X, Y, Z) of the clusters’ peak voxels are reported in Talairach space. Volume is mm3B bilateral, R right, L left, BA Brodmann area, OFC orbitofrontal cortex, vmPFC ventromedial prefrontal cortex, vlPFC ventrolateral prefrontal cortex, dmPFC dorsomedial prefrontal cortex, mPFC medial prefrontal cortex
